detaileddescription.para: Set drag'n'drop mode flag. Disabled (false) by default.

Event : Request for start drag. signature : void method(MyGUI::DDContainer* _sender, const MyGUI::DDItemInfo& _info, bool& _result)
_sender
widget that called this event
_info
information about DDContainers
_result
write here true if container can be draggedor false if it can't

Event : Request for start drop (moving mouse over container, but not dropped yet). signature : void method(MyGUI::DDContainer* _sender, const MyGUI::DDItemInfo& _info, bool& _result)
_sender
widget that called this event
_info
information about DDContainers
_result
write here true if container accept dragged widget or false if it isn't

Event : End drag (drop). signature : void method(MyGUI::DDContainer* _sender, const MyGUI::DDItemInfo& _info, bool _result)
_sender
widget that called this event
_info
information about DDContainers
_result
if true then drop was successfull

Event : Drag'n'drop state changed. signature : void method(MyGUI::DDContainer* _sender, MyGUI::DDItemState _state)
_sender
widget that called this event
_state
new state

Event : [not used] Request widget for dragging. signature : void method(MyGUI::DDContainer* _sender, MyGUI::Widget*& _item, MyGUI::IntCoord& _dimension)
_sender
widget that called this event
_item
write widget pointer here
_dimension
write widget coordinate here

Event : [Internal event] невалидна информация для контейнера. signature : void method(MyGUI::DDContainer* _sender)
_sender
widget that called this event

Event : [Internal event] !!обновить виджеты дропа DD_FIXME наверное internal. signature : void method(MyGUI::DDContainer* _sender, MyGUI::Widget* _item, const MyGUI::DDWidgetState& _state)
_sender
widget that called this event
_items
_state

briefdescription.para: {DDContainer} DDContainer widget description should be here.

childnode.edgelabel: eventKeySetFocus eventMouseSetFocus eventKeyButtonReleased eventKeyLostFocus eventRootMouseChangeFocus eventMouseWheel eventToolTip eventMouseLostFocus eventRootKeyChangeFocus
